ivardefs.name: basedOn
ivardefs.desc: A reference to the request that is fulfilled by this risk assessment.

ivardefs.name: basis_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the source data considered as part of the assessment (for example, FamilyHistory, Observations, Procedures, Conditions, etc.).

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: The type of the risk assessment performed.

ivardefs.name: condition
ivardefs.desc: For assessments or prognosis specific to a particular condition, indicates the condition being assessed.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: The encounter where the assessment was performed.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Business identifier assigned to the risk assessment.

ivardefs.name: method
ivardefs.desc: The algorithm, process or mechanism used to evaluate the risk.

ivardefs.name: mitigation
ivardefs.desc: A description of the steps that might be taken to reduce the identified risk(s).

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Additional comments about the risk assessment.

ivardefs.name: parent
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a resource that this risk assessment is part of, such as a Procedure.

ivardefs.name: performer
ivardefs.desc: The provider or software application that performed the assessment.

ivardefs.name: prediction_
ivardefs.desc: Describes the expected outcome for the subject.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: The reason the risk assessment was performed.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Resources supporting the reason the risk assessment was performed.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the RiskAssessment, using the same statuses as an Observation.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The patient or group the risk assessment applies to.

properties.desc: An assessment of the likely outcome(s) for a patient or other subject as well as the likelihood of each outcome.
